title: Last in the alphabet but 1st in our hearts, Happy B-Day, Zara!
content:
Happy Birthday Zara and thanks for countless hours of work keeping Typophile running!

ChrisL

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/z2_6261.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195659im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/thustra_4870.png)

 [‹ Handwritten Type. Where the heck to I start?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42961 "Go to previous forum topic") [Color synesthesia ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42974 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: I am so pleased that Typophile brought Zara to San Francisco. All of us Bay Area Fontheads are the better for it. Happy day, Command Zed!
Happy Birthday Zara - have a great day!
May your birthday be filled with beautiful typography.
Thanks so much, everyone! Receiving these wishes from you all makes this day better than ever :)

Well I guess it’s still your birthday on the Left coast, I hope it’s utterly loverly!  
happy happy,  
p

Dear Ms. Zed, :-)

Happy Birthday! Joyeaux Anniversaire!

Feliz Cumple, Zara!

One happy birthday — Aaalles, alles Gute — Zara.  
_(Nah, me late, again. ;)_

Dav(id)
I’m late, too. Happy birthday, Zara!
